page.title: 02ARMED FORCES
page.content: R.A.F. Edlesborough is a small camp site on land covering 177 acres.It is a receiving and communications station and involves highly secret information. At the centre of the site are two or three administration buildings and connected to these are many tall aerial masts which cover the whole site.The site is bordered by a tall fence, and a local farmer grazes sheep on the rough grassland which covers the camp. Along one of roads close to the perimeter fence is a row of houses which house some of the camp's personel and their families.
